data.eml:eml: A new species of Lamelligomphus Fraser, 1922 (Odonata: Gomphidae) from southern Yunnan, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Hao-Miao, Yang, Guo-Hui, Cai, Qing-Hua (2016): A new species of Lamelligomphus Fraser, 1922 (Odonata: Gomphidae) from southern Yunnan, China. Zootaxa 4098 (3): 571-581, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4098.3.9
